title: ぬるぬる動く実績バッジ2 - include
content:
[[iftags +コンポーネント・バックエンド]]
このユーザーコンポーネントのリファレンスは[[[reference:ta-badge-smooth|]]]です。
[[/iftags]]
[[div_ class="badges badge-{$name} {$name} a{${$name}} b{$type}"]]
[[div class="user-icon" style="background-image: url({$user-icon})"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="badge"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a1"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a2"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a3"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a4"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a5"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a6"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a7"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a8"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a9"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="aa a10"]]
[[/div]]
[[span id="u-{$name}-achieve"]][[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div id="u-{$name}-achieve-hovertip" class="b{$type}"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**{$title}**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**{$content}**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
tags: コンポーネント・バックエンド
author: R74
